Interrupts.Name: Discipline
Interrupts.Trigger: An ally in range 2 misses with an attack.
Interrupts.Effects: That ally re-rolls the attack roll with +1 boon, taking the second result as the final result.

Actions.Name: Leader's Strike
Actions.Effects: An ally in range 3 can dash 2 spaces.

Actions.Name: Flare Gun
Actions.Description: Ignores stealth. A foe in range 5 is branded and loses stealth.

Actions.Name: Volley Fire
Actions.Description: The Sergeant chooses a foe in range 8, then deals 2 piercing damage once to that foe, then once again for each ally in range 2 of the Sergeant.

Actions.Name: Marching Orders
Actions.Description: When Sergeant takes this stance, as an action, and at start of each of their turns, the Sergeant and all allies in range 2 can dash 2 in the same direction.
